question: I want to know the authentication of the the hadith as said by people " in order to gain ilm go to China also"
answer:
QUESTION
People in pakistan and india proove from this hadith(if it is so )that we are should travel the world in order to gain the wordly ilm. please make it clear wether it is a saying or a hadith. Jazak Allah
ANSWER


Share:
The Hadith, 'Seek knowledge even though it be in China.' narrated by Bayhaqi%0D%0Ais classified as Hasan lighayrihi by some Muhadditheen, ibn Abdul Barr and a%0D%0Afew others. (Ahsanul Fataawah vol.1 pg.433; HM Saeed)%0D%0A%0D%0ANabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) explains, 'True Ilm (knowledge) is only%0D%0A3. a) The clear verses (of the Qur'aan), 2) The Sunnah (Ahaadith), 3) The%0D%0Aobligation (of Deen). All (other knowledge) besides these are but an extra.'%0D%0A(Hayaatus Sahaaba vol.3 pg.252; Maktabatul Ilm). Ibn Umar (Radhiallaahu%0D%0AAnhu), the eminent companion of Rasul (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) says. It%0D%0A(Ilm) is the book of Allah and Sunnah of His Prophet (Sallallaahu Alayhi%0D%0AWasallam). Whosoever includes anything to this, of his own I know not,%0D%0Awhether this will be recorded among his good or bad deeds.' (Ibid with%0D%0Areference to Ibn Abdul Barr)%0D%0A%0D%0AIn view of the above Ahaadith and many more similar, the Ulama have stated:%0D%0AIlm is only that which is attained from the Ambiyaa (Prophets) by way of%0D%0Alearning and teaching Ilm-e-Shari'ah. (Allaamah Badruddin Aini; Ahsanul%0D%0AFataawa vol.1 pg.462 vol.1 pg.462; HM Saeed).%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai%0D%0AFATWA DEPT.
